content: That sounds great! I'm definitely going to plan a trip to the Berkshires in Massachusetts. I've always wanted to visit the Clark Art Institute in Williamstown, and the fall foliage will be a perfect backdrop. I'll also make sure to drive the Mohawk Trail and check out the scenic coastal towns. Oh, and speaking of coastal towns, I've been thinking about visiting Nantucket or Martha's Vineyard. Do you have any recommendations for things to do on the islands?
